channel.title: Contribute on SynthDIY Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Contribute on SynthDIY Wiki

item.title: Contributing content from your browser
item.description: First you need to create a GitHub account, log in and navigate to our GitHub repository

item.title: Repository structure and article formatting
item.description: All the content in the wiki lives in the /content folder of the repository and consists of pages written in markdown with a little bit of extra metadata.
